name: Not always right - text only
description:
This style takes away all pictures from notalwaysright.com and associated pages, including the social media buttons. This makes the page a bit friendlier to be used in a workspace environment.
It also makes the text a bit wider.

The domains this styles applies to are:
* notalwaysright.com
* notalwaysworking.com
* notalwaysrelated.com
* notalwayslearning.com
* notalwaysfriendly.com
* notalwayshopeless.com
* notalwaysromantic.com
